Every four levels (levels 4, 8, and 12) in a given class you have the option to either allocate 2 ability points or choose one of the Feats. If you choose ability points then you can increase one ability by two points or two different Abilities by one point. You can't increase any ability above 20 using this feature. However, you can go over 20 in Abilities by using items.
